00022 eolBool eol_equals(eolDouble a, eolDouble b)
00023 {
00024   return (fabs(a-b) < EOL_EPSILON)?eolTrue:eolFalse;
00025 }

00027 eolVec2D eol_vec2d(eolDouble x, eolDouble y)
00028 {
00029   eolVec2D vec;
00030   eol_vec2d_set(vec,x, y);
00031   return vec;
00032 }

00048 eolFloat eol_vec2d_magnitude (eolVec2D V)
00049 {
00050   return sqrt (V.x * V.x + V.y * V.y);
00051 }
00052 
00053 eolFloat eol_vec3d_magnitude (eolVec3D V)
00054 {
00055   return sqrt (V.x * V.x + V.y * V.y + V.z * V.z);
00056 }
00057 
00058 eolFloat eol_vec4d_magnitude (eolVec4D V)
00059 {
00060   return sqrt (V.x * V.x + V.y * V.y + V.z * V.z + V.w * V.w);
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 eolFloat eol_vec3d_magnitude_squared(eolVec3D V)
00065 {
00066   return (V.x * V.x + V.y * V.y + V.z * V.z);
00067 }
00068 
00069 void eol_vec2d_set_magnitude(eolVec2D * V,eolFloat magnitude)
00070 {
00071   if (!V)return;
00072   eol_vec2d_normalize(V);
00073   V->x *= magnitude;
00074   V->y *= magnitude;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void eol_vec3d_set_magnitude(eolVec3D * V,eolFloat magnitude)
00078 {
00079   if (!V)return;
00080   eol_vec3d_normalize(V);
00081   V->x *= magnitude;
00082   V->y *= magnitude;
00083   V->z *= magnitude;
00084 }
00085 
00086 void eol_vec4d_set_magnitude(eolVec4D * V,eolFloat magnitude)
00087 {
00088   if (!V)return;
00089   eol_vec4d_normalize(V);
00090   V->x *= magnitude;
00091   V->y *= magnitude;
00092   V->z *= magnitude;
00093   V->w *= magnitude;
00094 }
00095 
00096 eolBool  eol_vec3d_magnitude_less_than(eolVec3D V,eolFloat size)
00097 {
00098   return (eol_vec3d_magnitude_squared(V) < (size * size));
00099 }

00101 eolBool eol_distance_between_less_than3d(eolVec3D p1,eolVec3D p2,eolFloat size)
00102 {
00103   return eol_vec3d_magnitude_less_than(eol_vec3d(p1.x - p2.x,
00104                                                  p1.y - p2.y,
00105                                                  p1.z - p2.z),
00106                                        size);
00107 }

00110 {
00111   if(!out)return;
00112   out->x = cos(radians);
00113   out->y = sin(radians);

00123 void eol_vec2d_normalize (eolVec2D *V)
00124 {
00125   eolFloat M;
00126   if (!V)return;
00127   M = eol_vec2d_magnitude (*V);
00128   if (M == 0.0f)
00129   {
00130     return;
00131   }
00132   M = 1/M;
00133   V->x *= M;
00134   V->y *= M;
00135 }
00136 
00137 void eol_vec3d_normalize (eolVec3D *V)
00138 {
00139   eolFloat M;
00140   if (!V)return;
00141   M= eol_vec3d_magnitude (*V);
00142   if (M == 0.0f)
00143   {
00144     return;
00145   }
00146   M = 1/M;
00147   V->x *= M;
00148   V->y *= M;
00149   V->z *= M;
00150 }
00151 
00152 void eol_vec4d_normalize (eolVec4D *V)

00154   eolFloat M;

00157   if (M == 0.0f)
00158   {
00159     return;
00160   }
00161   M = 1/M;
00162   V->x *= M;
00163   V->y *= M;
00164   V->z *= M;
00165   V->w *= M;

00168 eolVec2D *eol_vec2d_dup(eolVec2D old)
00169 {
00170   eolVec2D *duped = NULL;
00171   duped = eol_vec2d_new();
00172   if (!duped)return NULL;
00173   eol_vec2d_copy((*duped),old);
00174   return duped;
00175 }

00195 eolVec2D *eol_vec2d_new()
00196 {
00197   eolVec2D *vec = NULL;
00198   vec = (eolVec2D *)malloc(sizeof(eolVec2D));
00199   if (vec == NULL)
00200   {
00201     eol_logger_message(
00202       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00203       "eol_types:failed to allocate a new vector!\n");
00204     return NULL;
00205   }
00206   eol_vec2d_clear((*vec));
00207   return vec;
00208 }

00240 eolFloat eol_vector_angle(eolFloat x,eolFloat y)
00241 {
00242   eolFloat angle = atan2(y, x) + M_PI;
00243   eolFloat fraction = angle * 0.5 / M_PI;
00244   if (fraction >= 1.0)
00245   {
00246     fraction -= 1.0;
00247   }
00248   return (fraction * 360);
00249 }
00250 
00251 void eol_angle_clamp_degrees(eolFloat *a)
00252 {
00253   if (!a)return;
00254   while (*a >= 360)*a -= 360;
00255   while (*a < 0)*a += 360;
00256 }
00257 
00258 eolFloat eol_angle_between_degrees(eolFloat a, eolFloat b)
00259 {
00260   eolFloat angle;
00261   angle = fabs(a - b);
00262   while (angle >= 360)angle -= 360;
00263   while (angle < 0)angle += 360;
00264   if (angle > 180)angle -= 180;
00265   return angle;
00266 }
00267 
00268 void eol_vec2d_reflect(eolVec2D *out, eolVec2D normal,eolVec2D in)
00269 {
00270   eolFloat f;
00271   f = eol_vec2d_dot_product(in,normal);
00272   out->x = in.x - (2 * normal.x * f);
00273   out->y = in.y - (2 * normal.y * f);
00274 }
00275 
00276 void eol_vec3d_reflect(eolVec3D *out, eolVec3D normal,eolVec3D in)
00277 {
00278   eolFloat f;
00279   f = eol_vec3d_dot_product(in,normal);
00280   out->x = in.x - (2 * normal.x * f);
00281   out->y = in.y - (2 * normal.y * f);
00282   out->z = in.z - (2 * normal.z * f);
00283 }
00284 
00285 void eol_vec4d_reflect(eolVec4D *out, eolVec4D normal,eolVec4D in)
00286 {
00287   eolFloat f;
00288   f = eol_vec4d_dot_product(in,normal);
00289   out->x = in.x - (2 * normal.x * f);
00290   out->y = in.y - (2 * normal.y * f);
00291   out->z = in.z - (2 * normal.z * f);
00292   out->w = in.w - (2 * normal.w * f);
00293 }
00294 
00295 void eol_vec3d_cross_product(eolVec3D *out, eolVec3D v1, eolVec3D v2)
00296 {
00297   out->x = v1.y*v2.z - v1.z*v2.y;
00298   out->y = v1.z*v2.x - v1.x*v2.z;
00299   out->z = v1.x*v2.y - v1.y*v2.x;
00300 }

00304   
00305 }

00321   return r;

00378 eolBool eol_rect_lap_rect(eolRect a, eolRect b)
00379 {
00380   if ((a.x > (b.x + b.w)) || (a.y > (b.y + b.h)) || (b.x > (a.x + a.w)) || (b.y > (a.y + a.h)))
00381     return eolFalse;
00382   return eolTrue;
00383 }

00386 void eol_orientation_copy(eolOrientation *dst,eolOrientation src)
00387 {
00388   if (!dst)return;
00389   eol_vec3d_copy(dst->position,src.position);
00390   eol_vec3d_copy(dst->rotation,src.rotation);
00391   eol_vec3d_copy(dst->scale,src.scale);
00392   eol_vec3d_copy(dst->color,src.color);
00393   dst->alpha = src.alpha;
00394 }
00395 
00396 void eol_orientation_clear(eolOrientation *out)
00397 {
00398   if (!out)return;
00399   eol_vec3d_set(out->position,0,0,0);
00400   eol_vec3d_set(out->rotation,0,0,0);
00401   eol_vec3d_set(out->scale,1,1,1);
00402   eol_vec3d_set(out->color,1,1,1);
00403   out->alpha = 1;
00404 }
00405 
00406 void eol_orientation_add(eolOrientation * out,
00407                          eolOrientation   in1,
00408                          eolOrientation   in2)
00409 {
00410   if (!out)return;
00411   eol_vec3d_add(out->position,in1.position,in2.position);
00412   eol_vec3d_add(out->rotation,in1.rotation,in2.rotation);
00413   eol_vec3d_add(out->scale,in1.scale,in2.scale);
00414   eol_vec3d_add(out->color,in1.color,in2.color);
00415   out->alpha = in1.alpha + in2.alpha;
00416 
00417   if (out->alpha < 0)out->alpha = 0;
00418   else if (out->alpha > 1)out->alpha = 1;
00419   
00420   if (out->color.x < 0)out->color.x = 0;
00421   else if (out->color.x > 1)out->color.x = 1;
00422   
00423   if (out->color.y < 0)out->color.y = 0;
00424   else if (out->color.y > 1)out->color.y = 1;
00425   
00426   if (out->color.z < 0)out->color.z = 0;
00427   else if (out->color.z > 1)out->color.z = 1;
00428 }
00429 
00430 void eol_orientation_mix(eolOrientation * out,
00431                          eolOrientation   in1,
00432                          eolOrientation   in2)
00433 {
00434   if (!out)return;
00435   eol_vec3d_add(in1.position,in2.position,out->position);
00436   eol_vec3d_add(in1.rotation,in2.rotation,out->rotation);
00437   eol_vec3d_add(in1.scale,in2.scale,out->scale);
00438 
00439   out->scale.x = in1.scale.x * in2.scale.x;
00440   out->scale.y = in1.scale.y * in2.scale.y;
00441   out->scale.z = in1.scale.z * in2.scale.z;
00442   
00443   out->color.x = in1.color.x * in2.color.x;
00444   out->color.y = in1.color.y * in2.color.y;
00445   out->color.z = in1.color.z * in2.color.z;
00446   
00447   out->alpha = in1.alpha * in2.alpha;
00448 
00449   if (out->alpha < 0)out->alpha = 0;
00450   else if (out->alpha > 1)out->alpha = 1;
00451 
00452   if (out->color.x < 0)out->color.x = 0;
00453   else if (out->color.x > 1)out->color.x = 1;
00454 
00455   if (out->color.y < 0)out->color.y = 0;
00456   else if (out->color.y > 1)out->color.y = 1;
00457 
00458   if (out->color.z < 0)out->color.z = 0;
00459   else if (out->color.z > 1)out->color.z = 1;
00460 }

00462 void eol_trail_new(eolTrail *trail,eolUint maxLen)
00463 {
00464   if (!trail)return;
00465   if (trail->trail != NULL)return;
00466   if (maxLen == 0)return;
00467   trail->trail = (eolOrientation *)malloc(sizeof(eolOrientation)*maxLen);
00468   if (trail->trail == NULL)return;
00469   memset(trail->trail,0,sizeof(eolOrientation)*maxLen);
00470   trail->maxLen = maxLen;
00471   trail->tail = &trail->trail[0];
00472   trail->head = &trail->trail[0];
00473 }
00474 
00475 void eol_trail_free(eolTrail *trail)
00476 {
00477   if (!trail)return;
00478   if (!trail->trail)return;
00479   free(trail->trail);
00480   memset(trail,0,sizeof(eolTrail));
00481 }
00482 
00483 void eol_trail_append(eolTrail *trail,eolOrientation orientation)
00484 {
00485   if (!trail)return;
00486   if (!trail->trail)return;
00487   trail->head++;
00488   if (trail->head >= &trail->trail[trail->maxLen])
00489   {
00490     trail->head = &trail->trail[0];
00491   }
00492   if (trail->tail == trail->head)
00493   {
00494     trail->tail++;
00495     if (trail->tail == &trail->trail[trail->maxLen])
00496     {
00497       trail->tail = &trail->trail[0];
00498     }
00499   }
00500   memcpy(trail->head,&orientation,sizeof(eolOrientation));
00501   if (trail->len < trail->maxLen)trail->len++;
00502 }
00503 
00504 eolUint eol_trail_get_length(eolTrail *trail)
00505 {
00506   if (!trail)return 0;
00507   return trail->len;
00508 }
00509 
00510 eolBool eol_trail_get_nth(eolTrail *trail, eolUint n, eolOrientation *ori)
00511 {
00512   int i;
00513   eolOrientation *it;
00514   if (!trail)return eolFalse;
00515   if (!trail->trail)return eolFalse;
00516   if (!ori)return eolFalse;
00517   if (n >= trail->maxLen)return eolFalse;
00518   it = trail->head;
00519   for (i = 0;i < n;i++)
00520   {
00521     it--;
00522     if (it < &trail->trail[0])it = &trail->trail[trail->maxLen - 1];
00523   }
00524   memcpy(ori,it,sizeof(eolOrientation));
00525   return eolTrue;
00526 }

00528 eolUint eol_true_from_string(char * truth)
00529 {
00530   if ((strcmp(truth,"TRUE") == 0) ||
00531     (strcmp(truth,"true") == 0) ||
00532     (strcmp(truth,"True") == 0) ||
00533     (strcmp(truth,"1") == 0))
00534     return eolTrue;
00535   return eolFalse;
00536 }
00537 
00538 eolUint eol_false_from_string(char * truth)
00539 {
00540   if ((strcmp(truth,"FALSE") == 0) ||
00541     (strcmp(truth,"false") == 0) ||
00542     (strcmp(truth,"False") == 0) ||
00543     (strcmp(truth,"0") == 0))
00544     return eolFalse;
00545   return eolTrue;
00546 }
00547 
00548 eolInt eol_bool_from_string(char * truth)
00549 {
00550   if ((strcmp(truth,"TRUE") == 0) ||
00551     (strcmp(truth,"true") == 0) ||
00552     (strcmp(truth,"True") == 0) ||
00553     (strcmp(truth,"1") == 0))
00554     return eolTrue;
00555   if ((strcmp(truth,"FALSE") == 0) ||
00556     (strcmp(truth,"false") == 0) ||
00557     (strcmp(truth,"False") == 0) ||
00558     (strcmp(truth,"0") == 0))
00559     return eolFalse;
00560   return -1;
00561 }
